Reviews.Title: usuarios Normales
Reviews.Author: Ruben Dario
Reviews.Content: muy buena laptop para usuarios basicos, que solo navegan.hacen trabajos,videos,fotos y demas a mi novia le encanta, la recomiendo ampliamente

Reviews.Title: Great Samsung laptop at a great price.
Reviews.Author: manning643
Reviews.Content: My girlfriends old laptop was to slow for our long distance chats. So I sent this laptop to her as a surprise gift. I have never actually seen the laptop. But she says she loves it and its lightning fast with windows 8 installed. Great gift. great PC.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: scooter
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews before I brought this laptop, and they were right about a lot of the items on this laptop. At first I thought I would not like window's 8, but I just love it, it's very easy window application, and it's nice that you can go back and forth to any application that you have opened. Samsung gives you more for there software too, a friend of mine bought a laptop (another brand with windows 8) and it didn't have as much software on it that this Samsung does, and my friends laptop was more expansive. I also like the Samsung applications it comes with, most of them are free, and you can go to the Samsung store app and download more. I won't get into the technical parts of this laptop, because it's easy to use, and there's a guide (manuel) that come with it. All in all I would buy another one as a gift for a family member. I give this product a 5 star.......
